_description: Configuration file for mapping old ticker symbols to current ticker symbols
_instructions: Add new mappings in the 'mappings' section below
Use exact ticker symbols as they appear in the historical data
Add deleted ticker symbols to the 'deleted_symbols' array
Changes take effect when running: python sp500.py --update-names

_examples.deleted_symbols: Companies that were removed from S&P 500 and should be deleted from historical data

Added Kraft Heinz merger mapping (KRFT -> KHC)
Added Warner Bros Discovery merger mapping (DISCA -> WBD)
